content: 4 bobble the 6 underarm st remove marker 1 knit front 33st remove marker 2 bobble 6 underarm st remove marker 3 knit back 33st remove marker 4 place front 33st patterned stitches onto a holder or waste yarn the front patterned and back garter stitch are now worked flat separately back leaving yarn attached turn your work so the front section faces you you will be knitting back across the back section row 1 ws sl1p knit to end of row row 2 rs sl1p ssk knit to last 3 st k2tog k1 the back section should now have 31 st work row 1 16 more times stopping when back garter stitch section measures 5cm / 2 from arm holes row 17 ws sl1p knit 7 slip 8 st just worked onto waste yarn bobble 15 st knit 8 slip 8 stitches just worked onto waste yarn break yarn 2 | p age front with wrong side facing you return the front stitches to needles and rejoin yarn row 1 ws sl1p repeat k3 p1 to last 4 st k4 row 2 rs sl1p ssk k to last 3 st k2tog k1 row 3 ws sl1p k2 p1 repeat k3 p1 to last 3 st k3 row 4 rs sl1p knit to end of row repeat row 3 and 4 for 9 more row or until pattern section measures 4cm / 1 6 begin front neckline rs sl1p knit 7 place 8 st just worked onto waste yarn bobble 15 knit 8 left shoulder with ws facing row 1 ws sl1 purl-wise k2 p1 k4 row 2 rs sl1 purl-wise k to end repeat row 1 and 2 for 21 more row or until strap measures 8 5cm / 3 3 from neckline ending on ws row break yarn leaving a 20cm / 8 5 tail using kitchener stitch graft the 8 shoulder strap stitches to the 8 back shoulder stitches right shoulder with ws facing rejoin yarn row 1 ws sl1p k3 p1 k3 row 2 rs sl1p k to end repeat row 1 and 2 for 21 more row or until when strap measures 8 5cm / 3 3 from neckline ending on ws row break yarn leaving a 20cm / 8 5 tail using kitchener stitch graft the 8 shoulder strap stitches to the 8 back shoulder stitches finishing weave in ends hand wash in wool detergent and lay flat to dry thanks for knitting my pattern i hope you enjoyed it xx 3 | p age
